org.drooms.api

Class Node

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.drooms.api.Node
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Comparable<Node>

    public class Node
extends Object
implements Comparable<Node>
    A single indivisible place on the Playground, where (part of) a worm or a wall can be located.

        public static Node getNode(int x,

        Get a node with particular co-ordinates.

        y - Vertical co-ordinate.
        Returns:

      • compareTo

        public int compareTo(Node arg0)
        A Node is considered larger than the other if it has a bigger getY(). In case these equal, larger getX() wins. Otherwise the nodes are equal.
        Specified by:
        compareTo in interface Comparable<Node>
